Klahanie Volunteers

Klahanie relies on volunteers like you! Learn more about all the different ways you can participate in our Committees and Events.

Committees

Volunteer for Events

Klahanie is a great place to live because of all the fun community events your HOA assessments help fund.  Events are growing every year, and we want to do more of them!  However, we cannot sustain and grow these events without volunteers. 

For more information, contact Events
